choices.text: Let me look at your wares.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Hello, traveler! What brings you to these parts?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: This is the town of Riverwood. I'm the blacksmith here.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I can help you with anything you need.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Please feel free to take a look.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I could use some help around the forge.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I'll pay you for your time.
